subsection.name: soapUI Maven Plugin Usage
subsection.p: Prior to using the plugin, add the eviware maven 2 repository either to your project or settings.xml;
Then, add the soapUI plugin to your pom.xml

The plugin will load the specified project file and run all TestCases available in all TestSuites. If you want to narrow down which TestSuites/TestCases/LoadTest to run, use the testSuite, testCase and loadTest properties for that purpose.

subsection.name: soapUI Pro Version
subsection.p: The Pro version of the maven 2 plugin uses the same configuration except that the artifactId should be maven-soapui-pro-plugin. Pro-specific properties are documented in the properties page.
